name: Helen Zhou
bio: Hello everyone! I am a sophomore majoring in SDS and Sociology. I use she/her pronouns. It's so nice to meet you all!

name: Radiah Khan
bio: Hi everyone, I am a current sophomore studying Statistical and Data Sciences & Quantitative Economics. I am originally from Dhaka, Bangladesh. My research interests include human behavior in social media around the places in the world, AI, computational social science. Overall combining social problems/behaviors with data science is what I am really interested in.

name: Kiara Sunil Singh
bio: Hi everyone! I'm currently a sophomore at Smith College majoring in Computer Science and Quantitative Economics. I am originally from Utah and and inerested in open-source AI, visual analytics, and exploring how technology can empower communities.

name: Chiashi Yang
bio: Hi, everyone! I am a sophomore majoring in Computer Science. I use she/her pronouns. I am interested in exploring ethical methods of using AI for social good.
